possède de nombreuses conventions de par: has numerous national and international academic and professional partnership agreements covering a wide spectrum of areas of collaboration ranging from the co-construction of diplomas to the preferential hiring of university graduates, including the mobility of professors and reception trainees in diversified sectors such as industrial engineering, electrical, mechanics, civil engineering, computer technologies, etc.
Dès la création de Université Méditerran: From the creation of the Mediterranean University, cooperation with partners was a strategic and absolute priority for the development of the university as well as the assignment of our students to internships and end of studies projects. Le stage est considéré par les sciences: The internship is considered by legal and economic sciences as a professional immersion which aims to apply the theoretical knowledge acquired through your training. The internship provides operational responses to concrete or strategic projects.
De nombreuses entreprises voient en ce s: Many companies see this internship as an opportunity for an observation period before hiring.
